If you are synchronizing Polarion with a central LDAP server user creation is not necessary. Instead users are synched with you LDAP server or created on first login of user.

  • Open administration>User Management>Users. Take care to select the project configuration
  • Fill the required fields with your credentials
  • Assign the global role: user
  • Assign the project role: project_user
  • As project admin you can´t automatically be assigned to work items or to an approval. If users should be able to select a user you need to add him to these roles.
    • Goto: User Management > Roles
      • assign the project role: project_assignable and project_approver to your admin
Hint: During this training we will do all exercises using our admin account. Your newly created user will be used to verify permission restrictions.
